metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16410 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.4. By sending multiple fragmentedIPv4 packets, the function Defrag4Reassemble in defrag.c tries to access amemory region that is not allocated, because of a lack of header_lenchecking.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
